description: Chocolate's witty play on words, likening flowers to 'choco-lit' for a sweet gesture.
title: Floral Sweetness
n_1: Coco, looking at a flower shop, gets an idea to impress Daisy.
c1_1: How about flowers that are truly sweet?
n_2: Coco presents Daisy with a bouquet of chocolate flowers.
c1_2: These are special, Daisy. They're choco-lit!
n_3: Daisy admires the unique bouquet, delighted by Coco's creativity.
c1_3: Only the sweetest for the sweetest.
c2_3: You always know how to make me smile.
n_4: Their laughter fills the air, a moment of joy shared over choco-lit.
c1_4: It's a perfect match, just like us.
c2_4: Indeed, Coco! You make every day special.
